attributes.action: Take accountability for FIREARMS being on our streets in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
They need to be held accountable for how firearms, knives and drugs reach on our streets which is destroying our community.

As a parent I have had enough. These MP’s, prime Ministers do not deserve the paycheck they receive especially for the amount of killings taking place. Members of our community are doing the ground work & risking their lives. We are not your slaves. We are cutting the strings from the puppet masters, YOU! You bring them into this country, so you are responsible,PERIODT!
attributes.background:
The government control the boarders for everything coming in & out of this country.

I request them to provide a track and trace on all firearms and knives to date & moving forward.
It is their responsibility to protect us. People have no involvement of gaining access to such things without them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about people bringing firearms and other offensive weapons into the UK, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Your petition refers to introducing "track and trace" for all firearms and knives, but it's not clear how this would work, or if you want it to apply to all firearms and weapons, or only those being brought into the UK.

There are already rules about bringing guns, knives, swords and other offensive weapons into the UK, which you can read here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/import-controls-on-offensive-weapons

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
